title: So done!
body:
I join in a ranked game everyones happy in champ select... we get into the game - pass by 20mins in. 

I'm like 10-1, our Yi is going 8-2 and our ADC is 1-6 She keeps blaming us because she's not getting kills and decides to trolls the game. 

She says "Have fun 4v5ing" and goes top all game.

Why does this happen to me? I do my best I try my best to help others but they don't care. I was super nice to everyone no one was even being mad at eachother and toxic? And all of a sudden she blames us for not "Giving her kills"?????

I just don't understand why I should lose LP for doing great in a game when someone else whos obviously only playing to troll can ruin it for everyone.

replies.body: i cringe so hard when i read shit like this....you were 10-1 and you still lost? im guessing instead of focusing on the game you let your self get dragged into a caits obvious bullshit and you ended up losing the game? if not i doubt i was far off.
What am I meant to do 2v5? Me and the other guy who was going 8-2 as Yi were tower hugging our tower. whilst the others didnt help.
